ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Plane of Sky Update
ygData.msgSnippet: Wow - grats to your guild Shada! Miriana s guild Legions of Darkness on Innoruuk has had recent success there as well (big WTG!! LOD too!) - like last night I
ygData.messageBody:
Wow - grats to your guild Shada!

Miriana's guild Legions of Darkness on Innoruuk has had recent success there
as well (big WTG!! LOD too!) - like last night I do believe:

(begin paste)
Subject: Nantik said not to!
Author: Girlge! Date Added: 04/20/2000 02:32am (PST)
So I will of course:

http://lightning.prohosting.com/~goge/eqpics/Splordd1.jpg

Highlights from the fight...

http://lightning.prohosting.com/~goge/eqpics/splord1.jpg

I never said it was a perfect evening...

http://lightning.prohosting.com/~goge/eqpics/notpretty.jpg

The most fun I've had in EQ since ... well, last weekends Pegasi ;p. Still,
this blows away PoF, PoH, and Dragons by a long shot. Strangely, the loot's
been mediocre =P - check Castersrealm in a few for Muyo's Necklace, assuming
he posts it.
(end paste)

Wtg to both of your guilds! Woo hoo some bad old birties!

Sylly


----- Original Message -----
From: "Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)" <garramone@...>
To: <eqbards@egroups.com>
Sent: Thursday, April 20, 2000 10:11 AM
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Plane of Sky Update


> my guild killed the Spiroc Lord a couple nights ago. i wasn't there as i
> worked all day but when i got home i was able to hear how the fights were
> going and went to sleep right before they attacked. i guess it is only
the
> second Spiroc Lord to be killed on all servers. i don't know how tough he
> was, i believe it was getting him alone that was the hard part. i've
missed
> all of our sky fights other than the duel-wielding dojo, have to put in so
> much time up there and with work and the baby it's tough.
>
> Shada Powa, L50 Wood Elf Bard
> Tyria Sarkin, L50 High Elf Wizard
> <Afterlife> Mithaniel Marr Server
>
>
> > Well, the weekend is over, and I spend almost all of it in
> > the Plane of
> > Sky. This is basically what happened.
> >
> > Day 1: Cleared Fairies and Azaracks, camped on Gorgalask
> >
> > Day 2: Cleared Gorgalask and Pegasus, camped on Pegasus
> >
> > Day 3: Recleared Pegasus, realized it was already 11PM, did
> > some poking
> > around on Spirocs and jumped off, leaving a necro and cleric
> > on pegasus
>
